stories.text:
I'm the founder of Sparrow (https://sparrowstartup.com/), a platform where startups get 1:1 growth advice from founders with exits and high ARRs. I'm an empathetic, no-BS guy and intend to be like that with you throughout. So please tell me what's on your mind.

Sparrow's making revenue but not enough to pay you a 5-figure salary. We can work out a compensation structure that works for you and openly talk about it - I'm a fair person.

A few requests:

- Be honest. If you think the vision is too ambitious, just call it out. If you think I'm being stupid, just say it.

- Be technically sound. Ideally, you'd have a solid experience with front and back end tech. If you don't know something that's fine - just tell me and we can figure out a way to help you learn that within a reasonable amount of time.

- We're early-stage. We cut costs and increase productivity, and do our best not to compromise on quality. Function > pretty.

. .

What you'll be doing: - Build a new website for Sparrow that accommodates startups and founders booking sessions together seamlessly without human intervention. The website must have the latest and greatest front-end tech. It'll have the following features: -> Calendar syncing -> Individual dashboards for both buyers and sellers -> Internal messaging and forum between buyers and sellers -> Stripe Connect that allows revenue split between Sparrow and sellers

- Find ways to optimize the users' experience including and not limited to: -> How the buyers sign up and book sessions -> How sellers are onboarded and interact with buyers

. .

If you've read this far, then you've probably figured out I'm the operational, non-technical, customer-facing founder. I'll take all that work off your plate so you can focus on building the scalable tech that'll make our customers' lives easier so they fall in love with you. I genuinely want you to be happy about what you'll build!

If you want to know how I think and how much I love this project, read here: https://sparrowstartup.com/purpose

If you want to get in touch, either use this website or just send me a ping here: https://sparrowstartup.com/get-in-touch

I need a partner I can count on. And I want to think I'll find him/her soon.
stories.title: HIRING for Tech Lead: Web Dev – front end, back end
